attributes.action: Stop teachers from shouting at children one on one unless they are doing something harmful or illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shouting at children should not be allowed in schools, unless being used to control a whole class or a child commiting a harmful or illegal act. Children should be talked to like an adult would be, calmly and respectibly as shouting can make children, notibaly young children, feel upset and lose respect in their teachers.
